original_text: For the punishment of the iniquity of the daughter of my people is greater than the punishment of the sin of Sodom, that was overthrown as in a moment, and no hands stayed on her.
korean_text: 전에 소돔이 사람의 손을 대지 아니하였는데도 순식간에 무너지더니 이제는 딸 내 백성의 죄가 소돔의 죄악보다 무겁도다

sentences.original_text: For punishment of the iniquity of daughter of my people
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성의 딸의 불의에 대한 형벌은

sentences.original_text: is greater than punishment of the sin of Sodom
sentences.korean_translation: 소돔의 죄에 대한 형벌보다 더 크니라

sentences.original_text: that was overthrown as in a moment
and no hands stayed on her
